Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.threadly.concurrent.collections.ConsumerIterator
    There is no replacement, this was only used in the now deprecated DynamicDelayQueue
    org.threadly.concurrent.collections.DynamicDelayedUpdater
    There is no replacement, please open a github issue if this class is useful to you
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.threadly.concurrent.AbstractService
    This has moved, switch to use AbstractService
    org.threadly.concurrent.collections.DynamicDelayQueue
    There is no replacement, please open a github issue if this class is useful to you
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.threadly.concurrent.future.FutureUtils.addCallback(ListenableFuture<T>, FutureCallback<? super T>)
    Call directly on the ListenableFuture: ListenableFuture.addCallback(FutureCallback)
    org.threadly.concurrent.future.FutureUtils.addCallback(ListenableFuture<T>, FutureCallback<? super T>, Executor)
    Call directly on the ListenableFuture: ListenableFuture.addCallback(FutureCallback)
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.allowCoreThreadTimeOut(boolean)
    Will be removed in 4.0.0 when dynamic pool size support is removed
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.getCorePoolSize()
    Will be removed in 4.0.0 when dynamic pool size support is removed
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker.getHighPriorityThreadAvailablePercent()
    Removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.getKeepAliveTime()
    Will be removed in 4.0.0 when dynamic pool size support is removed
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker.getLowPriorityThreadAvailablePercent()
    Removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker.getThreadAvailablePercent()
    Removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.prestartAllCoreThreads()
    Please use PriorityScheduler.prestartAllThreads()
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.setCorePoolSize(int)
    Use PriorityScheduler.setPoolSize(int)
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.setKeepAliveTime(long)
    Will be removed in 4.0.0 when dynamic pool size support is removed
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler.setMaxPoolSize(int)
    Will be removed in 4.0.0 when dynamic pool size support is removed
    org.threadly.concurrent.NoThreadScheduler.tick()
    please use NoThreadScheduler.tick(ExceptionHandlerInterface), providing null for the ExceptionHandlerInterface. This will be removed in 4.0.0
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler(int, int, long)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler(int, int, long, boolean)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long, boolean)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PriorityScheduler(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long, ThreadFactory)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker(int, int, long)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker(int, int, long, boolean)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long, boolean)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
    org.threadly.concurrent.PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker(int, int, long, TaskPriority, long, ThreadFactory)
    Dynamic thread pool size support will be removed in 4.0.0
